original_title: Andy Warhol's Factory People... Inside the Sixties Silver Factory
overview: Takes an in-depth look at the lives and times of the people who hung out with Andy Warhol and "worked" at the Silver Factory during the Sixties, making it all click as a new counter-culture arose and began to exert its influence throughout the arts.
title: Andy Warhol's Factory People... Inside the Sixties Silver Factory
